mapper.select: select num, writer, subject, reg_date, readcount, filename, filesize, down, ref, re_step, re_level, (select count(*) from board_comment where board_num = num) comment_count from board where shows = 'y' order by ref desc, re_step asc
select filename from board where num=#{num}
mapper.update: update board set down = down + 1 where num = #{num}
UPDATE board SET readcount = readcount + 1 WHERE num = #{num}
mapper.select: SELECT password FROM board WHERE num =#{num} and password = #{password}
mapper.update: UPDATE board set shows='n' where num = #{num}
mapper.insert: insert into board_comment (board_num, writer, content) values (#{board_num}, #{writer}, #{content});

insert into board (writer, subject, password, ref, re_step, re_level, content, ip, filename, filesize) values (#{writer}, #{subject}, #{password}, #{ref}, #{re_step}, #{re_level}, #{content}, #{ip}, #{filename}, #{filesize})
